title: Can we do something about this person?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
every hour he is not stopped 12 people get trolled and lose lp for no reason 

im not using riot suport becuz it doesnt work its too slow and the effort its not worth the automated response from the philippines

pittballz

replies.body:
pitballz still trash after all this time

biggest tiprat OCE
You shouldn't be doing this. Riot doesn't like it when people name and shame players as it tends to lead to witch hunts, which is negative for the community.
This is cute people more interested in forum rules than this guy trolling

That forum rule is %%%%ing stupid and anyone with half a brain agrees, there are people that never get punished so how the hell are we supposed to communicate with Riot to get them to do something? Emailing does nothing because you just get some stupid automated message and nothing changes, they just lie and say they'll look into it or they tell the truth and say they aren't gonna do %%%% about it, our only other option is to use the forums which Rioters actually look at.

You wanna know the real reason Riot doesn't allow it on the forums? Its so they don't look bad, they do nothing about it when you email and the tribunal is nonexistent so when people post it on forums Riot ends up looking stupid for doing nothing about it.
Oh my.... RITO pls notice this post and put an end to this {{champion:48}}
You can't stop a God, no matter how abusive of his powers he may be.
Lol that was 2 years ago
Gods never die.
They are simply replaced

He was not a god, he was a dip%%%% who lead other dip%%%%s.

and when he got what was coming to him from riot he came onto the forums and cried like the little b*tch that he is!
he was god
lol
At least he got 13/3/7 on his Draven :D
This guy should've been removed a long time ago, he is both toxic and troll, if the players gets their hands on him though ðŸ˜± I cannot imagine the punishment

I've played with this guy, only earlier today in fact. 7th game down (Teemo running Revive and Teleport). I was the Ahri. He stated that the game was unwinnable, so why not just feed? We all did reasonably well until the fed players started to impact us and was overall to hard. I would DEFINITELY like to see a permanent ban on this {{champion:48}} . All  they do is ruin the experience for others and, made myself, lose lp, which really doesn't help on my climb out of Bronze. Thank you.
you mean this game? LEL!
Yes please... we really need tribunal to punish these trolls.

> [{quoted}](name=Pesquire,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=X3lh5oTZ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-08T04:48:57.256+0000)
>
> Yes please... we really need tribunal to punish these trolls.

Tribunal? What tribunal? :|
reported.

"im not using riot suport becuz it doesnt work its too slow and the effort its not worth the automated response from the philippines"
Unfortunately not much but community outrage is going to come from posting on the forums either though :(
